main.tag_line: Automating your business with the power of custom software
main.contact_message: To reach out, please contact us using the email address below

videos.quote: Because of Gadget, We ave been able to focus on new opportunities instead of our process issues, which has resulted in real growth for Fruchtbote.

fruchtbote.description: Description: Fruchtbote is a specialty fruit ecommerce company focusing on delivering the highest quality fruits. Due to the nature of their business and customer expectations, they developed a unique process for order fulfillment that required pen and paper tracking. Gadget Software created a dedicated order fulfillment application to simplify and automate it.
fruchtbote.impact: Impact: One of their primary partners was able to save X hours a week, previously allocated to a repetitive setup and verification of our previous paper-led order fulfillment process. Errors in the packing step of order fulfillment have gone down by X%, and the speed and consistency increases have resulted in X, Y, and Z for Fruchtbote.

services.description: 'I don't have enough time, space or energy.' is a common obstacle that prevents many organizations from taking the actions necessary to move from just getting by to really thriving. We build software to free up you and your employees time and energy from the energy-sapping, repetitive  but necessary tasks of your business, so you can move onto bigger and better things.

'I don't see any software platform that solves the need of my organization.' If there is something different, or nuanced about your operations and you can't find off-the-shelf software to fit your needs, building custom software is a viable alternative. From custom accounting systems, data-visualization, e-learning systems and beyond, we have expertise in a wide range of situations and always start with your context first.

'I have a software project in mind, but I have no idea how to go about it starting it and completing it with my finances and sanity intact.' Software, while a complicated craft is not unteachable in its methodologies. The paths to failure are many, but the ones to success are few. From years of hard fought, acquired knowledge in the industry, we at Gadget Software have a pretty solid understanding of the patterns of what causes success and failure in any software project. Let us take you by the hand and get you focusing on what matters rather than the endless triviality that can distract you from getting your project done.
